\documentclass[tikz]{standalone}
\usepackage{quiver}
\usepackage{tikz-cd}

\begin{document}

\Huge
% https://q.uiver.app/?
\begin{tikzcd}
	c & {} \\
	& {{\displaystyle\coprod_{C(c,d)}c}} && d \\
	\\
	& {{\displaystyle\coprod_{C(c,d)}c}} && e
	\arrow["{\iota_{f_1}}"{description}, hook, from=1-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{\epsilon_d}"{description}, dashed, from=2-2, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{f_1}"{description}, curve={height=-50pt}, from=1-1, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{\epsilon_e}"{description}, dashed, from=4-2, to=4-4]
	\arrow["g"{description}, from=2-4, to=4-4]
	\arrow["{\iota_{g\circ f1}}"{description}, curve={height=50pt}, hook, from=1-1, to=4-2]
	\arrow["LFg"{description}, dashed, from=2-2, to=4-2]
\end{tikzcd}

\end{document}
